Title: Simple XNA Button
Description:
This is a project of a helper for instancing Simple Buttons in XNA with a ButtonPanel. Its got various features like. Load a Panel from a Plain Text File. And Windows Forms- like Buttons Behaviour. Check it out.


check http://elhendris.wordpress.com
